structure.unit: SCHOOL EMPLOYEES -- TEACHERS' RETIREMENT AND TENURE

law.catch_line: Limited or continuing contract with teachers required.
law.text: Each local district shall enter into written contracts, either limited or continuing, for the employment of all teachers.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. II, sec. 81, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 41, sec. 2. -- Amended 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 98, sec. 1. -- Created 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 113, sec. 2.
